articles.title: Scientists May Have Found an Ancient Path Into America 24000 Years Ago - ScienceAlert
articles.description: A frozen highway may have given ancient travelers a clear path from Siberia into the New World more than 10,000 years earlier than America's First Nations people are thought to have arrived.

articles.title: Israeli-American hostage Gadi Haggai has been declared dead - Fox News
articles.description: The Hostages and Missing Persons Families Forum announced Friday that Gadi Haggai, a 73-year-old Israeli-American taken captive by Hamas, has died. He is the first American hostage to have died in the war.
